successMessage: ...Success! The Yes needs the No to win against the No.
noProjects: No projects available at the moment.
contactDescription: Advice, project ideas or a simple existential question — it all starts with a message.
developerDescription: Christophe, FullStack React/Node Developer based in Paris.
passionDescription: Passionate about creating original and high-performance web applications.
developerTitle: Christophe, FullStack React/Node Developer based in Paris.
helloSubtext: Full-time Web Developer and former Business Developer
helloDescription: I create applications and websites for all audiences. I also develop Open Source projects, such as DealScout — a browser extension that displays YouTube video deals in one click.
helloCompany: In parallel I am developing a management application, EquiX, for professional stables
stackNote: *NB: The best stack is the one requested by the client.
focusIntro: Development of an Open Source browser extension that displays the 3 key elements of a YouTube video deal in one click:
focusPrivacy: All this without collecting any personal data
aboutMeText: I’m Christophe, a Web Developer crafting custom apps. After a first career in Business Development, I dedicated myself to my passion: designing and building original web solutions. I love turning ideas into real projects, with a special focus on code quality and UX.
aboutYouText: Maybe you’re here out of curiosity, passion or with an idea in mind. Either way, if you’re exploring this space, we probably share the same interest: the web and its possibilities.
goNext: Feel free to take a look at my projects ;)
portfolioSubtitle: Discover my latest client cases and the solutions developed for them
project1_description: Extension for extracting commercial offers from YouTube.
project1_objective: Scan the page, identify sales patterns, extract offers, display key info.
project2_description: Modern showcase site for an online communication agency.
project2_objective: Present the company & services, deliver a strong exclusive branding, contact form.
project3_description: Showcase site/portfolio for a promising young Galician DJ.
project3_objective: Mobile-optimized version, impactful design, agenda, audio player, contact form.
project4_objective: Calendar, bookings, user/admin/horse management, stats, notifications, etc.
emailSuccess: Email sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon!
